alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pennsuco, or near Miramar, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Miami Gardens, Weston, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Medley, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Country Club, Pennsuco and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
